featured.text: She was raised in an African American family filled with songs and stories of Southern myths, which later shaped her prose.

definition.zh_def: 散文；不以韻律或詩歌形式寫成的文學作品。
definition.en_def: Written or spoken language in its ordinary form, without metrical structure.
definition.example: She prefers reading prose over poetry because it feels more relatable.
